item.title: Song of The Week
item.dc:creator: oasisofhope
item.description:
Our Song of The Week Is By Jimmy Gait This week we feature the Song ‘Roho’  (Holy Spirit)  by Jimmy Gait. The song is a call for us to let the Holy Spirit guide us in everything that we do. Or as He puts it in his own words,… “The song is an appeal for us …

Song of The Week Read More »

The post Song of The Week appeared first on Oasis Of Hope International Ministry.
item.content:encoded:
Our Song of The Week Is By Jimmy Gait

This week we feature the Song ‘Roho’  (Holy Spirit)  by Jimmy Gait. The song is a call for us to let the Holy Spirit guide us in everything that we do.

Or as He puts it in his own words,… “The song is an appeal for us as Christians to follow the leading of The Spirit of God in everything we do. This will help us to please God and be in the right position with Him, which will guarantee us a great life here on earth, and eventually Eternal life.“

We couldn’t say it any better.

The song is sang in his native Kikuyu  dialect, but Jimmy is courteous enough to input English subtitles in the video. It samples a Kikuyu folk praise song and is very popular and sang during many Church praise and worship sessions in Kenya. As is ever so often the case, no matter how diversified a nation is, one always feels a stronger connection when conversing in their native language.
They say foreign languages speak to the mind but native languages speak to the heart. I guess this is why Jimmy chose to sing the song in it’s original language, perhaps as a way of expressing the inner desire of his own heart, to be truly led by the Spirit.
We feature this song because as a Church, this is our greatest desire as well, and we believe this ought to be the desire of every born again and confessing believer and non-believer as well. That the believer ought to be led only by the Spirit, and the non-believer ought to desire to come to the knowledge, confession and belief in Christ and subsequently be led by the Spirit too, for this constitutes the greatest way any man can live.

item.title: Gather The Remnants Project
item.dc:creator: oasisofhope
item.description:
Empowering tomorrow’s generation today. Partnering to build a world where all teens & youth are empowered to be valued contributors to tomorrow’s society. The Oasis of Hope Church recently began a project,… ‘Gather The Remnants’ which is aimed at empowering teens and youth to be productive contributors of tomorrow’s society by taking them through a …

Gather The Remnants Project Read More »

The post Gather The Remnants Project appeared first on Oasis Of Hope International Ministry.
item.content:encoded:
Empowering tomorrow's generation today.

Partnering to build a world where all teens & youth are empowered to be valued contributors to tomorrow’s society.

The Oasis of Hope Church recently began a project,… ‘Gather The Remnants’ which is aimed at empowering teens and youth to be productive contributors of tomorrow’s society by taking them through a series of intensive training on subjects such as:

Better Government Relations – Creation of Awareness &
Capacity Building on Government Policies, Better Parent & Society Relations, Time Management, Romantic Relationships Training, Financial/Business Training, Career Path Guidance, Training on Life Philosophies & Moral Code To Live By, Tips For Significance Success, Spiritual Growth Training, Healthy (Drug Abuse Free) Lifestyle, Music plus much more,…

These trainings first commenced in form of a Seminar that lasted from 22nd – Aug – 2018 to 25th – Aug – 2018 and the purpose is to hold these trainings at least twice every year during semester breaks. The trainings may take different forms each time they are held, i.e: Camps, Seminars, Trips e.t.c. The trainings were began in responce to the plight of many parents and the society at large for them to be held as a result of many teens and youth being exposed to many modern social ills that often times results to the youth engaging in drug abuse & radical immorality. The Church, on hearing the plight of these parents, decided to begin the ‘Gather The Remnats’ project.

Our desire is to better the society we live in that has been overrun by drug abuse, radical immorality and crime. Majority of the people engaging in these vices are the teens & youth. We strongly believe that if they can be taken through intensive training with a caring and loving support group , they can be transformed.

VIEW FULL PHOTO GALLERY

Gather The Remnants - December Edition

Gather The Remnants is happening again this December. You Can Register as early as now if you wish to participate either as a student or as a trainer.

Register For Gather The Remnants December Edition

The post Gather The Remnants Project appeared first on Oasis Of Hope International Ministry.
